description: Detects a file ending in jse, vbe, js, vba, vbs written by cscript.exe or wscript.exe
name: WScript or CScript Dropper
query: (process.executable:(*\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe) AND file.path:(C\:\\Users\\* OR C\:\\ProgramData*) AND file.path:(*.jse OR *.vbe OR *.js OR *.vba OR *.vbs))
author: Tim Shelton
